process.description: Verify from the web entry, modeler and screen controls.
process.name: TCP4-2214 Verify from the web entry modeler and screen controls
process.bpmn:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<bpmn:definitions xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:bpmn="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:dc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:di="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI" xmlns:pm="http://processmaker.com/BPMN/2.0/Schema.xsd" xmlns:tns="http://sourceforge.net/bpmn/definitions/_1530553328908" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" targetNamespace="http://bpmn.io/schema/bpmn" exporter="ProcessMaker Modeler" exporterVersion="1.0" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL http://bpmn.sourceforge.net/schemas/BPMN20.xsd">
  <bpmn:process id="ProcessId" name="ProcessName" isExecutable="true">
    <bpmn:laneSet id="node_2">
      <bpmn:lane id="node_3" name="first option">
        <bpmn:flowNodeRef>node_9</bpmn:flowNodeRef>
        <bpmn:flowNodeRef>node_12</bpmn:flowNodeRef>
        <bpmn:flowNodeRef>node_25</bpmn:flowNodeRef>
      </bpmn:lane>
      <bpmn:lane id="node_4" name="second option">
        <bpmn:flowNodeRef>node_10</bpmn:flowNodeRef>
        <bpmn:flowNodeRef>node_13</bpmn:flowNodeRef>
      </bpmn:lane>
    </bpmn:laneSet>
    <bpmn:exclusiveGateway id="node_9" name="Exclusive Gateway">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_15</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_17</bpmn:outgoing>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_19</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:exclusiveGateway>
    <bpmn:task id="node_10" name="Review Image2" pm:screenRef="553" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:assignment="requester" pm:assignmentLock="false" pm:allowReassignment="false" pm:config="{"reactions":false,"voting":false,"edit_comments":false,"remove_comments":false,"web_entry":null,"email_notifications":{"notifications":[]}}">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_17</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_21</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:task>
    <bpmn:task id="node_12" name="Review Image" pm:screenRef="552" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:assignment="requester" pm:assignmentLock="false" pm:allowReassignment="false" pm:config="{"reactions":false,"voting":false,"edit_comments":false,"remove_comments":false,"web_entry":null,"email_notifications":{"notifications":[]}}">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_19</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_23</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:task>
    <bpmn:endEvent id="node_13" name="End Event">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_21</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:incoming>node_23</bpmn:incoming>
    </bpmn:endEvent>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_17" name="Yes" sourceRef="node_9" targetRef="node_10">
      <bpmn:conditionExpression xsi:type="bpmn:tFormalExpression">yes == true</bpmn:conditionExpression>
    </bpmn:sequenceFlow>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_19" name="No" sourceRef="node_9" targetRef="node_12">
      <bpmn:conditionExpression xsi:type="bpmn:tFormalExpression">no == true</bpmn:conditionExpression>
    </bpmn:sequenceFlow>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_21" name="" sourceRef="node_10" targetRef="node_13"/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_23" name="" sourceRef="node_12" targetRef="node_13"/>
    <bpmn:startEvent id="node_25" name="Start Event" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:assignment="user" pm:assignedUsers="1" pm:assignedGroups="" pm:config="{"web_entry":{"require_valid_session":false,"screen_id":551,"completed_action":"SCREEN","completed_screen_id":550,"completed_url":"","enable_query_params":true,"password":"admin123","enable_password_protect":true,"exclude_data":[],"embed":{"position":"full","title":"Form","icon":"question-circle","color":null}}}">
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_15</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:startEvent>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_15" name="" sourceRef="node_25" targetRef="node_9"/>
  </bpmn:process>
  <bpmn:collaboration id="collaboration_0">
    <bpmn:participant id="node_1" name="Pool" processRef="ProcessId"/>
  </bpmn:collaboration>
  <bpmndi:BPMNDiagram id="BPMNDiagramId">
    <bpmndi:BPMNPlane id="BPMNPlaneId" bpmnElement="collaboration_0">
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_1_di" bpmnElement="node_1">
        <dc:Bounds x="280" y="130" width="740" height="480"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_3_di" bpmnElement="node_3">
        <dc:Bounds x="309.9999999999999" y="130.00000000000117" width="710.0000000000002" height="229.99999999999883"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_4_di" bpmnElement="node_4">
        <dc:Bounds x="309.9999999999999" y="360" width="710.0000000000002" height="250"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_9_di" bpmnElement="node_9">
        <dc:Bounds x="600" y="220" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_10_di" bpmnElement="node_10">
        <dc:Bounds x="440" y="380" width="116" height="76"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_12_di" bpmnElement="node_12">
        <dc:Bounds x="800" y="260" width="116" height="76"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_13_di" bpmnElement="node_13">
        <dc:Bounds x="620" y="510" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_17_di" bpmnElement="node_17">
        <di:waypoint x="618" y="238"/>
        <di:waypoint x="498" y="418"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_19_di" bpmnElement="node_19">
        <di:waypoint x="618" y="238"/>
        <di:waypoint x="858" y="298"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_21_di" bpmnElement="node_21">
        <di:waypoint x="498" y="418"/>
        <di:waypoint x="638" y="528"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_23_di" bpmnElement="node_23">
        <di:waypoint x="858" y="298"/>
        <di:waypoint x="638" y="528"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_25_di" bpmnElement="node_25">
        <dc:Bounds x="440" y="180" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_15_di" bpmnElement="node_15">
        <di:waypoint x="458" y="198"/>
        <di:waypoint x="618" y="238"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
    </bpmndi:BPMNPlane>
  </bpmndi:BPMNDiagram>
</bpmn:definitions>

screens.title: Account Opening WE Form Completion 2
screens.description: The screen displayed on submission of a web entry for account opening

config.content: Thank You!

config.label: Content
config.helper: The HTML text to display

config.label: Visibility Rule
config.helper: This control is hidden until this expression is true

config.label: CSS Selector Name

config.content:
We have sent an Identity Verification link to your phone/email.
Please complete the verification to complete your account opening application.

config.helper: The HTML text to display

config.content: We have also sent your joint account owners an email to complete their personal information and Identity Verification.
